posts.name: Bruster's
posts.note: Bruster's has counter-serve chain where all of the ice cream selections are made fresh on-site every day. If you like salted caramel ice cream, you need to order their sea salt caramel ice cream. If you like dark chocolate from what I could see you need to get Bruster's death by chocolate.

posts.name: Crab Deck
posts.note: The Crab Deck is a full service, waterfront dining, inside and outside on the Kent Narrows with lunch, dinner, happy hour, kids menu, and steamed crabs. When I'm here, I get an order of steamed shrimp, three or four of their largest crabs, and a side of corn on the cob, so I at least ate one vegetable.

posts.name: Family Meal Restaurant
posts.note: Family Meal Restaurant is a modern, all-day diner from 'Top Chef' runner-up Bryan Voltaggio, set in a former car dealership. You could eat only appetizers and still walk away happy. I have ordered their hoecakes with pimento cheese, and pickled carrots, their Korean BBQ wings, duck fat fried potatoes, and their deviled eggs with applewood smoked bacon and chives.

posts.name: Gravel and Grind
posts.note: Gravel and Grind is a full-service bike shop with an artisan coffee shop in downtown Frederick, MD. You should order their hot chocolate or one of their herbal teas either cold or hot depending on the weather.

posts.name: Storm Brothers Ice Cream Factory
posts.note: Storm Brothers Ice Cream Factory is a neighborhood ice cream parlor serving cones, shakes, flurries, sundaes and more since 1976. They have over 40 flavors so you should be able to find something you want to eat.

posts.name: Tastee Diner
posts.note: Tastee Diner is a longtime old-school diner serving home-style American comfort-food classics 24 hours, 7 days a week. I have mostly been here for dessert and maybe a breakfast or two over the years.

posts.name: Zoe's Chocolate Co.
posts.note: Zoe’s Chocolate combines the tradition of past generations and true artisan chocolatiers, with the modern sophistication of today’s flavors, trends, and ingredients. You need to buy yourself a roasted almond and dark chocolate bar.
